titles.title: Healthcare Fairness Act of 2013
To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to prohibit a government subsidy for the purchase of a health plan by a Member of Congress.
Healthcare Fairness Act of 2013

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: Healthcare Fairness Act of 2013 - Amends the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to prohibit the expenditure of federal funds to pay any portion of the premium for a health plan purchased by a Member of Congress pursuant to the Act.
